Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr with a blue painted lappet-wig with a broken projection at the top, a modelled face with a beard and crossed arms in relief holding a blue painted adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs(very worn); there is a back-pillar; the foot is damaged.
Condition: incomplete - foot damaged, glaze worn on back pillar
